channel.title: No items sell-able
channel.description: At the moment, I don't want any items in the game sell-able due to duping. I know how to do certain items using config.java but I need instead of adding all the item codes to that, is there any other way?

item.title: No items sell-able
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:2, topic:408133”]Add

if (c.playerRights >= 0) { c.sendMessage("Selling is disabled temporarily due to a dupe."); return false; }
under

[code] if (c.myShopId == 14)
return false;
for (int i : Config.ITEM_SELLABLE) {
if (i == itemID) {
c.sendMessage("You can’t sell

“+c.getItems().getItemName(itemID).toLowerCase()+”.");
return false;
}
}[/code][/quote]Didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: No items sell-able
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Add

if (c.playerRights >= 0) { c.sendMessage("Selling is disabled temporarily due to a dupe."); return false; }
under

[code] if (c.myShopId == 14)
return false;
for (int i : Config.ITEM_SELLABLE) {
if (i == itemID) {
c.sendMessage("You can’t sell

“+c.getItems().getItemName(itemID).toLowerCase()+”.");
return false;
}
}[/code]
